page.title: 16Before School - Tamar Valley
page.content:
On A School Day.
My sister wakes me up at eight o'clock in the morning. I get up and get dressed and have a wash. After that I walk down stairs. I make myself a cup of coffee and some toast. when I have finished, I wash up my dishes. Then I go into the lounge to watch either T.V. A.M. or Good Morning Britain. Usually I look at the Teletext for the sporting news.At twenty to nine I put on my coat. Then I kiss my mum good bye and go to Gunnislake School. When I get to school, which takes from five to ten minutes, I play football with my friends until five minutes to nine, when the bell rings and I go into the classroom.
